column4: I have a problem with flash on my newly installed Ubuntu 10.04. I tried doing sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree but it is already installed and I tried the Deb package from the flash website but it says it has a conflict with flashplugin-installer can someone help me, Thanks.
let me guess: you can't see things like youtube in firefox?
yes pallgone
reboot solved it
Yes that right, You Tube tells me that I need to install Flash
i had exactly the same
i went to applications==>ubuntu software center
i searched for "adobe flash"
and installed them one by one
untill i found one that worked for me
it was: adobe flash plugin version 10
by the way, the "me menu" and "gwibber" don't work to on lucid
i can't add a facebook account
ok
then they will get solved i guess
It was working fine on 9.10, I just upgraded and now its not working
i had the same
i just installed all the adobe flash tings till i found one that worked
!who | Gieke
Ok I got it working
Thanks
